reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: I'm not even going to install this switch. Immediately out of the box I noticed that it has a very cheap, hollow plasticky click when pressed. There's also a faint metallic sound like a little piece of metal inside is vibrating. There's also something off about the feel of pressing it, like it takes more force than a regular switch to get moving, and then snaps in too quickly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2024
reviews.title: Super cheap plasticky sound and feel

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: LOVE Lutron, but they missed the mark on this “white” color. Ugh, not sure what happened here, but the switch on the right in the included picture is NOT white. For reference, the regular switch on the left is made by Legrand. And, in the same room, I already have some Lutron dimmers that are absolutely white. Bummer is that I’m finally getting to installing these (ordered a pack of three, and they’re all this gray color), well past Amazon’s return window, so I’m hoping a call to Lutron will lead to these being replaced with actual white dimmers. Now, as for dimming function, these are fantastic. The little adjustment lever on the body of the dimmer to help you achieve a true minimum-dim is fantastic, especially with cheaper LED bulbs that quite often will only dim to 10%.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2024
reviews.title: This is white?

reviews.text: I purchased the 3 pack, was very excited with these new dimmer switches. However, when I try to install them today, I found one of them doesn’t work while the other two worked fine. Talked to Amazon customer service but only full return for refund can be done… quite frustating for me. Be careful if you are buying multiple packs and make sure you test them all before installing any!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024
reviews.title: Not all switch works. Be careful if you purchase multiple packs!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: I was initially concerned when I saw the condition of the box (see photo) and heard something rattling around when I tilted the box a bit. My concern turned to disappointment when I opened the box to find all three dimmer switches had obviously been installed at some point and then returned. As you can see in the photos, the overall condition of the box containing the three boxed switches would make most people suspect that the item had been opened and used before. If you look carefully at the photos of the switches, you can see electrical tape on some of the wires, some of the wires have been cut short, the wires are curled at the ends from being wrapped around a screw or fastened in a wire nut, and something had been soldered on the metal flange on the lower side of each switch. In addition, there were only 2 mounting screws laying loose in the box. These are going back and I’ll look for a different source for the switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2024
reviews.title: Beware — Received used switches

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: This product was installed with the correct bulbs by professional electricians. Of the three-pack, one of the dimmers worked properly. One didn't work at all. The last one turned on and the dimmer worked for the first 24 hours, and then stopped dimming (the light remained stuck on the highest setting). If one of the three was problematic, I'd assume it was a fluke, but two of the three not working is a problem. These are not cheap dimmers, and because we were past Amazon's return window (remodel of course taking longer than expected before they were installed) we had to contact the manufacturer, who kept telling me "because we're not there to verify the installation," they could not help me with a replacement product. I do not recommend working with this company.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.title: 2 of 3 dimmers arrived BROKEN and TERRIBLE customer service

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: My girlfriend decided to replace her switches with dimmers and purchased this brand. I installed them for her and was so impressed with the easy of installation and how dependable they are that I bought three for myself when I purchased my new home. First off, the company not only provides you with written instructions, but they have a link to their website which will put you through a quick Q&A to determine your exact setup before showing you video installation instructions. That made it super-easy for this DIY'er to figure out how to install them correctly. The installation is a breeze and after taking about 10 minutes the first time I installed one (partly due to limited room for cables in the electrical box) every other one that I have installed have been done in a about 2 to 3 minutes. Additionally, the dimmers have a control slider that goes behind the cover (not included) which lets you adjust the lowest brightness settings in case you are using LED lights since if there is not enough power, they won't light up at all. This has proven extremely valuable for me as I have one dimmer in a kitchen with three pot lights, one dimmer in a living room with a central chandelier, and the other in a music studio with a fancy LED lighting setup. In all three situations, these worked brilliantly. If you are looking for easy to install, dependable, and with multiple customization options, these are the perfect dimmer switches for you.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.title: Extremely easy to install and setup; works perfectly

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150 Watt, Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVCL-153P-WH-3, White, 3 Pack
reviews.text: Unlike the single-pack box of the same dimmer switch, the 3-pack doesn't include any twist caps. This is fine if you are installing with all 4 wires, because normal twist caps will work. But if you are doing a 3-wire installation and need to cap off the unused 4th wire, you'll have a hard time finding a small enough twist cap to tighten onto a single wire. That's annoying. But everything else about these switches is absolutely perfect!

reviews.title: These don't come with any wire twist caps, and single-wire caps are hard to find

reviews.text: These switches work great. I especially appreciated the directions which make installation very easy, even for lights with a common wire (more than one switch that controls the light). One suggestion I have for buyers is to check and adjust the adjustment dial (carefully!) before putting the cover plate back on. This will adjust your dimmest point so that it gets dim enough but not so dim that the lights turn off or buzz.

reviews.text: Okay, so we love these LED's and will retrofit the entire house, garage, and shed in them. I also recommended them to all our friends to get these materials here. Here is what works: The 6" ultra thin recessed lights 5000K DAYLIGHT Dimmable with junction box is perfect. Home wiring was 12-2 to connect them in the living room low attic ceiling. YES!!!!!!!!!!!! USE THIS!!! Lutron DVWCL-153PH-2-WH Diva 150-Watt Single Pole/3-Way LED/CFL Dimmer with Wallplate (2 Pack), White ******* Max range dimmer with the ON/OFF adjust diming range setting (NEED THIS!!!) Has the wall plate too. YES 1- Leviton 6674-P0W SureSlide Universal 150-Watt LED and CFL/600-Watt Incandescent Dimmer, White ******Works good but no ON/OFF to set dimmer to max low and high settings so the lowest dim is still too bright for watching a movie at night. No wall plate. 2- Lutron S-600P-WH 600-Watt Skylark Single-Pole Dimmer, White Works well but no ON/OFF max dimmer ajustor and it looks clunky. No wall plate. NO!!!! Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs | Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVCL-153P-WH-3 | White (3 Pack) You will get a straight turned on light and NO dim. The one in the outlet sparked many times just by turning it on. No wallplates and wire nuts are way too small. NO NO NO
